Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a host of features that make it stand out from the rest. I believe its value far exceeds $80, but considering your potential satisfaction and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you can purchase this product for $100. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our top-tier solution. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information about how this product can benefit you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
